page.title: 12TRAINING TO FIGHT FIRES
page.content: There are no specific qualifications needed to enter the school but candidates need to pass an{intelli- {gence test}which consists mainly of general knowledge. They also need to pass a{practical exam}and a{medical. The recruits are trained in first aid and are required to have a heavy goods vehicle driving license to drive the large fire appliances. The course involves the{theory}of fires as well as{practical work extinguishing fires on old planes with the fire appliances. When the students return to their own air fields, they must have a good knowledge of the layout and topology of their field in order to reach a fire quickly. As yet,{no women recruits}have embarked on the course, because of its physical demands.
